questions.question: A DC shunt motor works on the AC mains
In a DC Motor, unidirectional torque is generated with the help of
The counter emf of a DC motor

answers.c: helps in energy conservation(by controlling current input)

questions.question: If pole flux of DC motor approaches to zero its speed will

answers.a: approach a stable value between zero and infinity
answers.c: no change due to corresponding change in back emf
